  • Hello!

v1.10.5 is released

Hajime Hoshi
2020-03-12

We are very happy to announce the release of v1.10.5. This includes only bug fixes from v1.10.4.

  • EbitenView class was not found in an Android library generated by ebitenmobile on Windows (Issue #1096).

Enjoy!

Feedback about this page? Please reach out on GitHub. Thank you!
